name: AJJ
description: '''AJJ''' is an American [[folk punk]] band from [[Phoenix, Arizona]], originally formed in 2004 as '''Andrew Jackson Jihad'''. Their lyrics handle themes of [[shyness]], [[poverty]], [[humanity (virtue)|humanity]], [[religion]], [[addiction]], [[existentialism]], and [[politics]]. Singer/guitarist Sean Bonnette and bassist Ben Gallaty co-founded the band, and have remained its only constant members throughout. The band has released eight studio albums to date, with their most recent, ''Disposable Everything'', having been released on May 26, 2023.
